code: protected Message getAnswerMessage(final Exchange exchange) {     Message answer = exchange.getIn().     if (ExchangeHelper.isOutCapable(exchange)) {         answer = exchange.getOut().         // preserve headers         answer.getHeaders().putAll(exchange.getIn().getHeaders()).     }     return answer. }
protected void answerWith(final Exchange exchange, final String header, final Object value) {     final Message answer = getAnswerMessage(exchange).     answer.setHeader(header, value). }
